title: Progression
flavourText: Some text concerning why we must progress
description:
This text is from an argument I have had with someone on Discord. Everything about this is dumb.

Backstory: A moderator of the Minecraft SMP server I was playing on at the time decided to ban bedrock-breaking and access to the Nether ceiling at all, and undoing all my work on the Nether highway. I was basically accusing them for stifling humanity's progression.
